forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers this morning. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers this morning. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 23F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 37F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 37F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain tapering to showers. Areas of freezing rain early. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light freezing rain later at night. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light freezing rain after midnight. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain in the morning...continued cloudy in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of light freezing rain early. The clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with periods of light freezing rain late. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with light freezing rain becoming likely after midnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will change to a mixture of wintry precipitation later at night. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening. Then a wintry mix overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.
